caption.center: JOSE LUIS RODRIGUEZ, Appellant, v. THE STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District.

opinion.attorneys:

NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.
